item.title: About
item.description: It is not our abilities that show what we truly are, It is our choices. Hi, Thanks for stopping by 👍 I’m Molla Mostafizur Rahman Rimon (Rimon Mostafiz in short) a Software Enginner from Dhaka, Bangladesh. Education ✏️ BSc in Computer Science and Enginnering United International University September, 2011 - September, 2016 Work 🏢 Software Engineer Tiger IT Bangladesh Limited December, 2016 - Present Competitive Programming Trainer United International University April, 2018 - October, 2018 Why Blog ❓ When you read something, you simply convince yourself that you understand it properly.
